description.english: Leave the starter location without opening the iron gate
description.french: Quitter la zone de départ sans ouvrir la porte en fer
description.spanish: Sal de la primera zona sin abrir la puerta de hierro
description.schinese: 在不开启钢铁大门的情况下离开起始地
description.russian: Покинуть стартовую позицию, не открывая железных врат
description.hungarian: Juss ki a kezdőhelyről anélkül, hogy kinyitnád a vas kaput
description.romanian: Pleacă din locația de pornire fără a deschide poarta de fier
description.tchinese: 在不開啟鋼鐵大門的情況下離開起始地

description.english: Jump out of the tower
description.french: Sauter de la tour
description.spanish: Salta de la torre
description.hungarian: Ugorj le a torony tetejéről
description.romanian: Sari din turn

description.english: Find every hidden chest before entering the Sewers the first time
description.russian: Найти каждый спрятанный сундук перед тем, как войти в Канализацию в первый раз
description.french: Trouver tous les coffres cachés avant d'entrer dans les Égouts la première fois
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los cofres ocultos antes de entrar a las alcantarillas por primera vez
description.schinese: 在第一次进入下水道之前找到每一个隐藏的箱子
description.hungarian: Kutass fel minden rejtett ládát, mielőtt eljutsz a Csatornákhoz
description.romanian: Găsește fiecare cufăr pierdut înainte de a intra în Canalizare prima dată
description.tchinese: 在第壹次進入下水道之前找到每壹個隱藏的箱子

displayName.hungarian: Keresem a szót, keresem a hangot

description.english: Get a proper voice from the Wizard
description.french: Trouver une voix qui sied au Magicien
description.spanish: Obtenga una voz adecuada del Mago
description.schinese: 从巫师处获得一个合适的声音
description.hungarian: Szerezz hangot a Varázslótól
description.romanian: Obține o voce corectă de la vrăjitor
description.tchinese: 從巫師處獲得壹個合適的聲音

description.english: Get three damage in a row from Luminous Fungus
description.french: Trois dommages d'un coup au Champignon Lumineux
description.spanish: Recibe tres daño seguidos de Luminous Fungus
description.schinese: 连续三次受到发光真菌的伤害
description.russian: Получить три урона подряд от Светящегося Грибка
description.hungarian: Ütközz neki háromszor sorozatban a Fluoreszkáló Gömbgombának
description.romanian: Obține trei pagube la rând de la Fungusul Luminos
description.tchinese: 連續三次受到發光真菌的傷害

description.english: Learn the moves on your own
description.french: Apprendre les coups soi-même
description.spanish: Aprende los movimientos por tu propia cuenta
description.hungarian: Tanuld meg magadtól a mozgásokat
description.romanian: Află singur mișcările

description.english: Get killed by a Magic Box
description.french: Se faire tuer par une Boite Magique
description.spanish: Ser asesinado por una caja mágica
description.hungarian: Öljön meg egy Mágikus Doboz
description.romanian: Fii ucis de o cutie magică

description.english: Listen to the Magic Mirror showing your past
description.russian: Послушать Волшебное Зеркало, показывающее твое прошлое
description.french: Écoutez le Miroir Magique vous dicter votre passé
description.spanish: Escucha el Espejo Mágico mostrando tu pasado
description.schinese: 倾听魔镜诉说你的过去
description.hungarian: Nézz vissza a múltadba a Varázstükörrel
description.romanian: Ascultă oglinda magică care îți arată trecutul
description.tchinese: 傾聽魔鏡訴說妳的過去

displayName.english: What doesn't kill you makes you surprised
displayName.russian: То, что не убивает тебя, удивляет тебя
displayName.french: Ce qui ne vous tue pas vous surprend
displayName.spanish: Lo que no te mata te sorprende
displayName.schinese: 那些不会要你命的东西会让你大吃一惊
displayName.hungarian: Ami nem öl meg, az nem működik rendesen
displayName.romanian: Ceea ce nu te omoară te face surprins
displayName.tchinese: 那些不會要妳命的東西會讓妳大吃壹驚

description.english: Get eaten by a chest
description.french: Se faire manger par un coffre
description.spanish: Ser comido por un cofre
description.hungarian: Egyen meg egy láda
description.romanian: Fii mâncat de un cufăr

description.english: Deliver the Weird Device to Teachy
description.french: Livrer l'Étrange Dispositif au Prof
description.spanish: Entregue el aparato extraño a Teachy
description.schinese: 把这个奇怪的装置交给老师
description.hungarian: Vidd el a Fura Szerkezetet Taninak
description.romanian: Livrează dispozitivul ciudat la Teachy
description.tchinese: 把這個奇怪的裝置交給老師

description.english: Deliver the missing books to Lory
description.french: Livres les livres perdus à Lory
description.spanish: Entregue los libros perdidos a Lory
description.schinese: 把丢失的书送到洛里那里
description.hungarian: Szerezd meg Lorynak a hiányzó könyveit
description.romanian: Livreaza cărțile lipsă lui Lory
description.tchinese: 把丟失的書送到洛裏那裏

description.english: Bring a flower to the Magic Mirror
description.french: Ramener une fleur au Miroir Magique
description.spanish: Trae una flor al Espejo Mágico
description.hungarian: Vigyél virágot a Varázstükörnek
description.romanian: Adu o floare la Oglinda Magică

description.english: Listen to every tale of the Fountain

description.hungarian: Hallgasd meg a Szökőkút összes történetét
description.romanian: Ascultă fiecare poveste a Fântânii
description.tchinese: 聽每壹個關於噴泉的故事

description.english: Ask everything from Raven
description.french: Tout demander au Corbeau
description.spanish: Pregúntale todo a Cuervo
description.hungarian: Tudj meg mindent Hollóról
description.romanian: Întreabă totul de la Corb

displayName.english: Cloudy with a chance of meteors

description.english: Defeat the Flying Maintainer without being hit by a meteor

description.romanian: Învinge Întreținătorii Zburători fără a fi lovit de un meteor

description.romanian: Eliberează Mergătorul pe Țevi și spunei prietenilor săi

description.english: Destroy the device to save the creatures of Ruined Realm
